attributes.action: reduce fuel duty as to stop the economic knock on efffect wich is effecting 75% of us who are struggling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is getting out of hand,10% increase in petrol and diesel prices within six months,why the increase in lpg,more and more money thrown away from everyones weekly budget trying to make ends meet,we all need fuel to get to work school deliver food and other necesities and retail prices forever creeping all trying to absorb the ever increasing price of fuel and most of it is tax wich i feel we all pay more than our fair share now it is crippling me financially and i am not the only one,try and bring up five children run two cars and a small family company i am about to give up i have had enough i cannot afford this anymore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
